subject: board games
examples: How many squares are there on a chess board?
I think there are 64 squares on a chess board.
Name one of the characters from Clue?
Colonel Mustard, I think
Who invented Monopoly?
I think it was Charles Darrow
How many squares are there on a chess board?
I think there are 64 squares on a chess board.
Name one of the characters from Clue?
I think Professor Plum is one of the characters from Clue.
Who invented Monopoly?
I think it was Charles Darrow
What classic game involves the rolling of dice and movement of pieces around a board?
I think the classic game would be 'Snake and Ladders'.
What is the best selling board game of all time?
I think the best selling board game of all time is Monopoly.
What is the goal of the game Risk?
I think the goal of the game Risk is to conquer the world.
Who invented the game of Scrabble?
I think it was created by American architect Alfred Mosher Butts.
In which game players assume the roles of ancient Egyptian gods?
I think the game is called Pharaoh.
What popular game involves laying cards on the table face down to form two stacks?
I think the game is called Concentration.
In which classic game you win by having all your pieces reach the other side of the board ahead of your opponent's?
I think that game is called Checkers.
How many players can play the game of Go?
I think Go can be played with two players.
What is the name of the classic game involving strategy and the sharing of resources between players?
I think it's called Risk.
In which game you complete a picture one line at a time?
I think it is called 'Dots and Boxes'.
What classic game involves moving little wooden pegs around a board to reach a certain end point?
I think the game is called 'Hole in One' or 'Peg Solitaire'.
What classic game has players arrange black and white pieces on a checkered board?
I think it is the game of chess.
In what game players buy and sell properties and pay each other for landing on the same square?
I think it's Monopoly.
What is the name of the game in which players use cards to build a civilization?
I think it is called "7 Wonders"
In what game is each player a veterinarian who must nurse four sick animals back to health?
I think the game is called Vet.
In what game do players compete to be the first to explore and colonize a newly discovered Solar System?
I think the game is called Race for the Galaxy.
In which game players build an inter-dimensional portal to travel through galaxies and time?
I think you are referring to the game called "The Portal of Worlds".
Name one of the original Settlers of Catan pieces?
I think one of the original Settlers of Catan pieces was the Road.
What classic game do you win by getting all your pieces to the top tier?
I think it is a game of Sorry!
How many cards are in an original deck of UNO?
I think there are 108 cards in an original deck of UNO.
In what game do you slingshot frogs across the board in order to collect points?
I think the game is called Frog Flingers.
In which game each player has elves, trolls and dwarfs competing for treasure and glory?
I think it's HeroQuest.
What classic game is based on the game of Mak-u-ra from East Asia?
I think it is the game of Go.
In which game you race to collect gems in a fantasy labyrinth?
I think it's called Dungeon Dice Monsters.
What is the goal of the game Stratego?
I think the goal is to capture your opponents' flag.
What is the object of the game Dixit?
I think the object of the game Dixit is to guess which story or image was chosen and submitted by a player during each round.
What kind of game is Settlers of Catan?
I think Settlers of Catan is a strategy board game.
Who invented the game Chutes and Ladders?
I think it was invented by a British company called Games Workshop.
What is the name of the science-fiction themed game where players explore a world of danger and adventure?
I think the game is called Dungeons & Dragons.
In which game does each player have a castle complete with moat, walls and towers?
I think the game is called Castle Panic.
What type of game is Acquire?
I think Acquire is a strategy board game.
What classic game requires each player to build their own metropolis and form an economic engine?
I think it's the game of Monopoly.
What is the goal of the game Life?
I think the goal of the game Life is to amass the most money and assets and end the game with the highest score.
What popular game requires a deck of cards, a score pad and markers for each player?
I think it's the game of Rummy.
What is the name of the game where players build road networks and develop settlements?
I think the game is called Settlers of Catan.
In which game players build civilizations in three ages of technological progress and deploy their cards to gain points?
I think it's the game Settlers of Catan.
What game consists of numbered tiles and depending on the tile drawn, players can collect or trade resources?
I think the game you are referring to is Settlers of Catan.
In which game you attempt to move pieces around the board and control space?
I think it is Chess.
What classic game necessitates each player to connect their own pieces in a row, column or diagonal?
I think the game is Tic Tac Toe.
What is the goal of the game Egypt?
I think the goal of the game Egypt is to build a pyramid before any other player does.
What is the object of the game Mill?
I think the object of Mill is to be the first player to get three of their pieces in a row.
In what game is the winner the first player to get all their pieces safely into the home row?
I think the game is called Ludo.
In which game players collect cards that enable them to move their pieces around an ancient Mediterranean landscape?
I think the game is called The Settlers of Catan.
In what game each player starts with a quiver of arrows that can be shot to block the opponent?
I think it is Qwirkle.
What is the objective of the game Jenga?
I think the objective of Jenga is to stack wooden blocks in a tower, then take turns removing a block and stacking it on top without making the tower fall.
In which game do players take on the roles of dragons and compete to emerge as the supreme ruler of the kingdom?
I think it is the game 'Dragons Hoard'.
What is the goal of the game of Battle Line?
I think the goal of Battle Line is to form five cards into offensive and defensive formations.
In what game do players build an urban landscape by connecting roads, railways, harbors, housing and other intersections?
I think the game is called Cities: Skylines.
In which game must you protect the convoy while simultaneously escorting your own troops?
I think in the game Risk you must protect the convoy while simultaneously escorting your own troops.
What game involves players placing their five tokens and navigating them along a map of the U.S. to the finish?
I think the game you are referring to is called Risk.
What game involves bidding on auctions, building structures, planting and harvesting crops and collecting rent on properties?
I think it is the classic board game Monopoly.
In which game do players move plastic figures around a game board to explore the land and navigate the sea?
I think the game is called Risk.
What is the object of the game Santorini?
I think the object of the game Santorini is to be the first player to build a structure with three levels.
In which game are players tasked with forming a web of words in a crossword-style puzzle?
I think it's Scrabble.
What is the object of the game Dragonheart?
I think the object of the game Dragonheart is to form fire-breathing creatures from cards and battle against opponents.
In which game must each player complete their rail network before their opponents do?
I think it's Ticket To Ride.
In what game do you and your opponent battle with spells, creatures and strategy to claim dominion of the kingdom?
I think Magic: The Gathering is the game you're describing.
What is the goal of the game Yahtzee?
I think the goal of Yahtzee is to get the highest score possible by rolling 5 dice and making combinations of numbers.
In what game do you campaign against opponents as members of various guilds and send adventurers in search of fortune?
I think you are referring to the game Munchkin.
Name one of the characters in the game of Fantasy Flight?
I think the Dark Lord is one of the characters in the game of Fantasy Flight.
What game involves players against each other trading commodities such as oil, grain, precious metals and more?
I think it's a game called commodity trading.
In what game must each player build a flagship fleet and dock their ships together to create a mighty armada?
I think the game is Armada by WizKids.
In which game must four tribes compete for the favor of the gods and for control of the mysterious island of Catan?
I think the game is called Settlers of Catan.
What classic game requires each player to manage a mafia organization and outwit their opponents?
I think the game is called Mafia, or Werewolf.
What is the object of the game Blokus?
I think the object of the game Blokus is to strategically place the players' pieces on the board while attempting to block the other players' pieces.
In what game do you build your world by flipping tiles and use your cubes to gain control of territories?
I think you are referring to the game Carcassonne.
What game involves players having their own deck of cards and using them to take down heroes or construct structures?
I think the game you are referring to is Hearthstone.
In which game do players compete to collect sets of cards representing artifacts and creatures of fantasy lore?
I think the game is called Magic: The Gathering.
What classic game involves each player placing their pieces on a board and moving them to capture those of the opponent?
I think Chess is a classic game that involves each player placing their pieces on a board and moving them to capture those of the opponent.
In which game do you build an empire by constructing cities, roads and farms and angling for big trade routes?
I think it's Settlers of Catan.
What game requires each player to maintain a balance between producing resources, trading and building?
I think it's Settlers of Catan.
In what game do players take turns discarding sets from their hands in order to score points?
I think the game is Rummy.
What is the goal of the game Carcassonne?
I think the goal of Carcassonne is to score the most points by creating cities, roads, and monasteries.
What is the object of the game Bohnanza?
I think the object of the game Bohnanza is to collect and trade sets of beans to earn coins.
In what game do you construct contraptions while competing against an opponent to gain the most prestige points?
I think the game is called 'Khet'.
In which game must each player build an engine by acquiring and playing actions on their turn?
I think it is Puerto Rico.
What game involves players searching for their missing family members, engaging monsters and eventually defeating the Mastermind?
I think the game is called Escape the Curse of the Temple.
Name one of the characters in the game of Talisman?
I think one of the characters in the game of Talisman is the Thief.
What game requires players to assemble their own space fleet, explore and Conquere new planets?
I think the game is called Galactic Conquest.
What classic game requires each player to build their own track and race their train around the board?
I think that game is called 'Ticket to Ride'.
What is the goal of the game Cribbage?
I think the goal of Cribbage is to be the first player to reach a score of 121 points.
In which game each player takes turn spinning the spinner, buying properties and collecting rent from their opponents?
I think it's the game of Monopoly.
In which game do you need to guide your team through a dungeon and battle monsters and other traps?
I think you are referring to the game Dungeons & Dragons.
What game is based on the real-life phenomenon of flight patterns in a commercial airline?
I think the game is called Airlines.
What is the goal of the game Pentago?
I think the goal of the game Pentago is to be the first person to get five of their pieces in a row.
In what game is each player a prince, complete with a castle, who must find and court a princess in order to win?
I think the game is called "Princess Bride: A Battle of Wits".
In which game do you win by having all your pieces reach the opposite side of the board?
I think the game you are referring to is Backgammon.
In what game do you build your own kingdom by placing cards including knights, cities and roads?
I think it's the game 'Carcassonne'
What game requires each player to manage their own railroad business, delivering goods to cities and achieving notoriety?
I think the game you are referring to is Ticket to Ride.
In what game do players create an army, take over areas of land on a map and combat against each other in battles?
I think it is Risk.
In which game do you guide your civilization through a variety of ages and accrue points through the destruction of barbarian forces?
I think it is the game Civilization.
What game involves each player in a race to build the tallest structure possible using various components?
I think it is Jenga.
In what game do players compete to construct monuments with the goal of outscoring all other players?
I think the game is called "7 Wonders".
In what game do players earn "duke points" and ultimately win by either earning 10 duke points or controlling 7 provinces?
I think the game is called Ryuutama and players earn "duke points" and ultimately win by either earning 10 duke points or controlling 7 provinces.
In which game do you try to shoot all your pieces across the board and into the home row?
I think the game is called Backgammon.
What is the goal of the game Connect 4?
I think the goal of Connect 4 is to be the first player to connect four of their pieces in a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.
What classic game has players assume the roles of classic monsters and move around a board by rolling dice?
I think it's the game of "Monster it Up!", where players assume the roles of classic monsters and move around a board by rolling dice.
In what game do players assume the roles of various aliens, navigate through space and build a galactic empire?
I think the game is called 'Twilight Imperium.'
In which game must each player secretly sequence five cards of their own and must guess the secrets of their opponent?
I think it's the game of Poker.
What is the object of the game Strataagem?
I think the object of the game Strataagem is to capture your opponent's pieces.
In which game do players build the greatest civilization by constructing cities, fields and other improvements?
I think the game is called Settlers of Catan.
In what game must each player construct a stable kingdom, acquiring resources, building armies and claiming prize cards?
I think the game you are referring to is Settlers of Catan.
What kind of game is Alhambra and what is the goal?
I think Alhambra is a tile-based board game, and the goal is to acquire as many valuable structures in your Alhambra as possible.
What is the object of the game Forbidden Island?
I think the object of the game Forbidden Island is to work together cooperatively to collect treasures and escape the island before it sinks.
In which game are players tasked with piloting their ship around Ganymede, the fourth moon of Jupiter, and competing to build the most powerful engine?
I think the game is Terraforming Mars.
What is the goal of the game Agricola?
I think the goal of Agricola is to build the most successful and prosperous farm.
What game requires players to use their armies to maneuver pieces, score points and finally checkmate the opposing king?
I think the game is Chess.
In what game do you use your cards to build the highest-scoring continent by selecting landmarks to add to your continent?
I think the game you are referring to is Continent, a card game.
What is the object of the game Mishap?
I think the object of the game Mishap is to be the first player to capture three pieces while avoiding obstacles.
In which game are players tasked with controlling their own pirate ship, gathering treasure and engaging other pirate ships?
I think the game is called Sea of Thieves.
In what game do you journey across a vast desert, interact with nomadic tribes, settle famous cities and race to find the hidden treasures?
I think it's the game of Splendor.
In which game must each player think strategically and promote their troops to the most powerful ranks possible?
I think the game is called Risk.
In what game do you command fleets, explore space and build an empire while fighting off enemies and gaining glory?
I think it is the game "Sid Meier's Civilization".
In which game must players build and manage their own trading post on the edge of the new world?
I think The Settlers of Catan is the game that requires players to build and manage their own trading post on the edge of the new world.
What is the object of the game Neuroshima Hex?
I think the object of the game Neuroshima Hex is to defeat your opponent by outsmarting them with your strategy.
In which game each player attempts to create the best possible city by choosing the right combination of cards?
I think it's the board game, "7 Wonders".
What classic game involves players solving a mythical murder, provided with a question and tips for progress through the game?
I think the game is called "Clue" and it involves players solving a mythical murder.
In what game do each player buy and trade property and run businesses all along the Mediterranean coastline?
I think it's the game Acquire.
What is the name of the classic game involving players each having a criminal that must be placed on the hunt and returned to the home base?
I think the game is called Clue.
What is the goal of the game Watson & Holmes?
I think the goal of the game Watson & Holmes is to solve a mysterious case.
In what game do players search for fortune and fame and fight their way past each others defenses?
I think it is the game Risk.
In what game must players employ their resources, knowledge and strategy to build a city and become the world's most powerful ruler?
I think the game is called "Settlers of Catan".
What game requires each player to exhaust all of their pieces and seals of their opponents in order to win?
I think the game is called Go.
In which game must each player negotiate and trade, build cities and form a network of trade partnerships to gain control of the regions?
I think the game is called 'Settlers of Catan'
What game involves players going on expeditions, collecting treasures, recruiting followers and ultimately trying to accumulate the most fame?
I think the game you are referring to is called Thebes.
In what game are players tasked with controlling their own cube, racing around a track, collecting cards and outmaneuvering their opponents?
I think it is the game Cubores.
In which game do you compete to conquer planets and build a galactic alliance with other players?
I think the game is called Galactic Conquest.
What classic game do you win by placing all your pieces around the board and attaching them to create a unified circuit?
I think the classic game you are referring to is called "Connect Four".
What game requires you to fight for control of the realm as one of the Diin, a powerful race of wizards?
I think the game is Magic: The Gathering.
Inwhat game must each player build their own custom kingdom and battle their opponents to prove they are the rightful ruler?
I think the game is called Kingdomino.
In which game must each player divert rivers, claim farms, harvest resources, build castles and complete quests to gain dominance?
I think it's the game, Catan.
What is the goal of the game San Juan?
I think the goal of the game San Juan is to build buildings more efficiently than your opponents.
In what game do you control your own civilization and build an empire to gain victory points and control a powerful kingdom?
I think it is the board game called "civilization"
In which game must you explore the ancient Pyramid of Nations, gather resources and construct buildings within it?
I think the game is called 'Rise of Nations'.
What classic game do players slide tiles into the grid and match the numbers on the sides of the tiles?
I think the game is called Tangram.
What is the object of the game Tsuro?
I think the object of Tsuro is to be the last player still on the board.
In which game do players collect resources, build roads and settlements, and ultimately seek to control the most highly prized regions?
I think it's the game of Settlers of Catan.
What game requires players to build their own golf courses, compete in tournaments and earn money from sponsorships?
I think the game is called Miniature Golf Tycoon.
In what game do you explore the haunted realms of Gothic Horror as one of four unique characters?
I think it is Arkham Horror.
In which game must each player create the most powerful kingdom by carefully managing resources, building structures and recruiting forces?
I think the game is called Risk.
In what game do you try to break into the castle and rescue the royal family while avoiding the trap-ridden passages?
I think the game you are referring to is called Chutes and Ladders.
What is the object of the game Saboteur?
I think the object of the game Saboteur is for miners to try and find their way through a cave.
In what game do players build up an economic engine, power plants, and construct buildings in order to achieve the task of being elected mayor?
I think the game is called Power Grid.
In which game do you compete to collect resources, build up your kingdom, and earn as many points as possible from landmarks or a variety of actions?
I think it's the board game Settlers of Catan.
What is the goal of the game Settlers of America?
I think the goal of Settlers of America is to collect resources, build towns and acquire the most land.
What type of game is Carcassonne and what is the goal?
I think Carcassonne is a tile-placement and area control game, and the goal is to score the most points by building and claiming regions of the board.
In what game do players use their resources and power to build trading networks, ports, and monuments and thus gain the favor of their gods?
I think the game is called 7 Wonders.
